label: How do I contact an organizer?
content: Through our Discord! Join using the button above!

label: How many people can be on a team?
content: HackDay Teams consist of three members per team. You can either apply with a team, or apply without a team and get matched with one for the event.

label: How long do we have to work on our projects?
content: Hacking begins at 11:00 AM and ends at 6:00 PM. You will have 7 hours to work on your project.

label: Will there be food?
content: We will provide lunch and dinner (New York Eats and Chipotle!), times are available on the schedule above.

label: Where is the event?
content: The event is being held at the SEIR in rooms 194, 198, 294, and 298!
